text: Google AI is a part of Google that focuses on creating smart computer systems. The team studies different areas of artificial intelligence (AI), such as machine learning and natural language processing. One of their achievements, Gemini, is an advanced language model intended to help with writing, planning, and learning. The findings from their research are used to improve many Google products: * Search: AI technology helps the search engine better understand user queries for more relevant results. * Assistant: AI enables Google Assistant to understand user requests and provide answers or perform tasks. * Photos: AI helps organize and find specific images within Google Photos. Overall, Google AI aims to use AI to make technology more helpful for everyone. Category:Google Category:Artificial intelligence
title: Google AI
